ISceneElem

Defines our base interface common to all scene elements

Functions
RayIntersect
virtual bool RayIntersect(
Ray3& ray,
RayIntersect3* pIntersection,
IMaterialAttrib** pMaterial
) = 0

Traces a single path through the scene

Parameters
ray
Ray3&

ray to trace

pIntersection
RayIntersect3*

returns ray intersection info

pMaterial
IMaterialAttrib**

returns the material at the intersection point

Returns

True if ray intersects the scene element. False otherwise.

uint32 pass
) = 0
